sentences.sentence: Follow-through is everything in golf, just like life.
sentences.translation: 善始善终是高尔夫的要领所在，就像生活一样。

sentences.sentence: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
sentences.translation: 像你明天就会离世那样生活，像你可以永葆青春那样学习。

sentences.sentence: Some people choose to see the ugliness in this world. The disarray. I choose to see the beauty.
sentences.translation: 一些人选择去看见这个世界的丑陋，混乱，我选择去发现美好。

sentences.sentence: Every detail of life is so delightful.
sentences.translation: 生活的每个细节都会带来喜悦。

sentences.sentence: It scares us more than anything except death being alone.
sentences.translation: 除了死亡，我们最害怕的是孤独。
